snippet.title: Faith, flow, & facing the COVID-19 crisis w/ Jordan Hall - Voices with Vervaeke
snippet.description:
This is a followup to our recent discussion on COVID 19, rationality and faith. In particular what does faith look like right now at the intersection of the meaning crisis and civilization change due to worldwide pandemics?

I mention Plato's theory of anagoge and faith within Socratic dialogos. Please see episodes 4 of Awakening from the Meaning Crisis  for Socratic dialogue  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lhl51bZQlM8&list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ&index=4 and episode 5 on Plato and anagoge  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=neDutbcedUY&list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ&index=5

For a discussion of reciprocal opening and religion today please see this talk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0JxL-acvuM&t=513s

For a discussion on beauty, flow, and love please see 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XRz1_QlB_O0&list=PLJ7feqEXm8OQzMWk2rSLvgLjg-L2bVZnm

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis.
